scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Carole P. Roman
scrape.text: Excellent picture into our morally corrupt society. How the parents can even sit and have dinner, knowing that they are all talking at each other rather than to each other. The whole disconnect from society, morality, each other is a chilling example of where our culture is headed. Insightful written, with a perception of the disaster of the lack of honesty and integrity that we seemed to have lost track of.
